mapper.insert: insert into question_fill_blank (question_id, blank_index, answer) values (#{b.questionId}, #{b.blankIndex}, #{b.answer})
mapper.select: select id, question_id, blank_index, answer from question_fill_blank where question_id = #{questionId} order by blank_index, id
select id, question_id, blank_index, answer from question_fill_blank where question_id in #{id} order by question_id, blank_index, id
